entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Periods of light snow beginning late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning then increasing to 40 gusting to 60. High 6. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early in the evening. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 15 March 2023
